pages.text: This will teach you the different custom villagers here! For most of them, just give them the proper name and presto, they're there!

pages.name: Timothy
pages.text: This is good ol' Timothy, or Timmy as I like to call 'im. He gives misc things that don't really fit with the other villagers. He also offers Head Boxes...how nice...

pages.name: Book Guy
pages.text: This one, she sells an Unobtainable Recipes book. But not only that, but she also grants special weapons/tools if you're willing to give the required stuff to her

pages.name: Decor Guy
pages.text: This gal gives items that, as her name suggests, are for looks. They do look good though, hats off to you, Chaos

pages.name: Baby Item Merchant
pages.text: She loves babies, so much that she's willing to give you some baby-care items as well. I'll never understand humans...

pages.name: Gem Guy
pages.text: This girl loves gems, and she sells all the special gems available in the game for a fairly cheap price each.

pages.name: Loot Box Guy
pages.text: the loot box gal is a bit trickier to get. She comes from an egg sold by the Egg Guy. She offers some loot boxes from this fine datapack!

pages.name: Egg Guy
pages.text: This gal has a thing for spawn eggs, er, creation capsules. She'll give ya some of the ones of unobtainable mobs, like Illusioners and Giants!

pages.name: Potion Master
pages.text: She loves potions, and she'll give you her very own concoctions for a price. Although...her potions are a bit...oddly named...
